overview: Anberlin expands its grasp of what a rock record can be with their third studio album, Cities. The Florida quintet's cohesive and adventurous new album uplifts as much as it initiates thought and elicits emotion. The writing team of singer Stephen Christian and guitarist Joseph Milligan drives Anberlin, alongside veteran producer Aaron Sprinkle, to a new frontier with vastly widened boundaries on Cities.
title: Anberlin: The Making of Cities
